student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. You're performing a Q&A exercise, by Discussing hobbies with 'enjoy + ing', using, for example, 'I enjoy eating, I enjoy doing, I enjoy going…'. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hello! I enjoy reading books. What do you enjoy doing?
Hello! I enjoy playing soccer. What else do you enjoy doing?
I also enjoy listening to music. When you leave your house, what do you enjoy doing?
conversation.advanced_content: I also enjoy listening to music. When you go out, what do you enjoy doing?

conversation.content: I enjoy going for walks. What do you enjoy doing on weekends?
On weekends, I enjoy watching movies. What about you? What do you enjoy doing on weekends?
I enjoy visiting friends on weekends. Do you enjoy trying new foods?
Yes, I enjoy trying new foods! It’s fun to taste different dishes. Do you enjoy cooking too?
Yes, I enjoy cooking too! It’s exciting to try new recipes. Do you enjoy traveling?
Yes, I enjoy traveling! It’s great to see new places. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!
